description: Returns the scan findings for the specified image.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The repository for the image for which to describe the scan findings.

parameters.name: imageId
parameters.description: An object with identifying information for an image in an Amazon ECR repository. imageDigest (string) --- The sha256 digest of the image manifest. imageTag (string) --- The tag used for the image.

nested_params.name: imageDigest
nested_params.description: The sha256 digest of the image manifest.

nested_params.name: imageTag
nested_params.description: The tag used for the image.

nested_items.name: registryId
nested_items.description: The registry ID associated with the request.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The repository name associated with the request.

nested_items.name: imageDigest
nested_items.description: The sha256 digest of the image manifest.

nested_items.name: imageTag
nested_items.description: The tag used for the image.

nested_items.name: imageScanStatus
nested_items.description: The current state of the scan.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current state of an image scan.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the image scan status.

nested_items.name: imageScanFindings
nested_items.description: The information contained in the image scan findings.

nested_items.name: imageScanCompletedAt
nested_items.description: The time of the last completed image scan.

nested_items.name: vulnerabilitySourceUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time when the vulnerability data was last scanned.

nested_items.name: findingSeverityCounts
nested_items.description: The image vulnerability counts, sorted by severity.
(string) ---
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: findings
nested_items.description: The findings from the image scan.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name associated with the finding, usually a CVE number.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the finding.

nested_items.name: uri
nested_items.description: A link containing additional details about the security vulnerability.

nested_items.name: severity
nested_items.description: The finding severity.

nested_items.name: attributes
nested_items.description: A collection of attributes of the host from which the finding is generated.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The attribute key.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value assigned to the attribute key.

nested_items.name: enhancedFindings
nested_items.description: Details about the enhanced scan findings from Amazon Inspector.

nested_items.name: awsAccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID associated with the image.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the finding.

nested_items.name: findingArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the finding.

nested_items.name: firstObservedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the finding was first observed.

nested_items.name: lastObservedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the finding was last observed.

nested_items.name: packageVulnerabilityDetails
nested_items.description: An object that contains the details of a package vulnerability finding.

nested_items.name: cvss
nested_items.description: An object that contains details about the CVSS score of a finding.

nested_items.name: baseScore
nested_items.description: The base CVSS score used for the finding.

nested_items.name: scoringVector
nested_items.description: The vector string of the CVSS score.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: The source of the CVSS score.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of CVSS used for the score.

nested_items.name: referenceUrls
nested_items.description: One or more URLs that contain details about this vulnerability type.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: relatedVulnerabilities
nested_items.description: One or more vulnerabilities related to the one identified in this finding.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: The source of the vulnerability information.

nested_items.name: sourceUrl
nested_items.description: A URL to the source of the vulnerability information.

nested_items.name: vendorCreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that this vulnerability was first added to the vendor's database.

nested_items.name: vendorSeverity
nested_items.description: The severity the vendor has given to this vulnerability type.

nested_items.name: vendorUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the vendor last updated this vulnerability in their database.

nested_items.name: vulnerabilityId
nested_items.description: The ID given to this vulnerability.

nested_items.name: vulnerablePackages
nested_items.description: The packages impacted by this vulnerability.

nested_items.name: arch
nested_items.description: The architecture of the vulnerable package.

nested_items.name: epoch
nested_items.description: The epoch of the vulnerable package.

nested_items.name: filePath
nested_items.description: The file path of the vulnerable package.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the vulnerable package.

nested_items.name: packageManager
nested_items.description: The package manager of the vulnerable package.

nested_items.name: release
nested_items.description: The release of the vulnerable package.

nested_items.name: sourceLayerHash
nested_items.description: The source layer hash of the vulnerable package.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the vulnerable package.

nested_items.name: fixedInVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the package that contains the vulnerability fix.

nested_items.name: remediation
nested_items.description: An object that contains the details about how to remediate a finding.

nested_items.name: recommendation
nested_items.description: An object that contains information about the recommended course of action to remediate the finding.

nested_items.name: url
nested_items.description: The URL address to the CVE remediation recommendations.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: The recommended course of action to remediate the finding.

nested_items.name: resources
nested_items.description: Contains information on the resources involved in a finding.

nested_items.name: awsEcrContainerImage
nested_items.description: An object that contains details about the Amazon ECR container image involved in the finding.

nested_items.name: architecture
nested_items.description: The architecture of the Amazon ECR container image.

nested_items.name: author
nested_items.description: The image author of the Amazon ECR container image.

nested_items.name: imageHash
nested_items.description: The image hash of the Amazon ECR container image.

nested_items.name: imageTags
nested_items.description: The image tags attached to the Amazon ECR container image.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: platform
nested_items.description: The platform of the Amazon ECR container image.

nested_items.name: pushedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the Amazon ECR container image was pushed.

nested_items.name: registry
nested_items.description: The registry the Amazon ECR container image belongs to.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the repository the Amazon ECR container image resides in.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of resource.

nested_items.name: score
nested_items.description: The Amazon Inspector score given to the finding.

nested_items.name: scoreDetails
nested_items.description: An object that contains details of the Amazon Inspector score.

nested_items.name: adjustments
nested_items.description: An object that contains details about adjustment Amazon Inspector made to the CVSS score.

nested_items.name: metric
nested_items.description: The metric used to adjust the CVSS score.

nested_items.name: reason
nested_items.description: The reason the CVSS score has been adjustment.

nested_items.name: score
nested_items.description: The CVSS score.

nested_items.name: scoreSource
nested_items.description: The source for the CVSS score.

nested_items.name: scoringVector
nested_items.description: The vector for the CVSS score.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The CVSS version used in scoring.

nested_items.name: severity
nested_items.description: The severity of the finding.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the finding.

nested_items.name: title
nested_items.description: The title of the finding.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the finding.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the finding was last updated at.

nested_items.name: fixAvailable
nested_items.description: Details on whether a fix is available through a version update. This value can be YES, NO, or PARTIAL. A PARTIAL fix means that some, but not all, of the packages identified in the finding have fixes available through updated versions.

nested_items.name: exploitAvailable
nested_items.description: If a finding discovered in your environment has an exploit available.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The nextToken value to include in a future DescribeImageScanFindings request. When the results of a DescribeImageScanFindings request exceed maxResults, this value can be used to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
